Notes: A spiky plant that damages the player when touched. It can be destroyed with fireballs, Yoshi's projectiles, the Rock power-up and the Rainbow power-up, Coconuts and Stretch Plants. It can be frozen by the Orange Luma.

Obj_arg0.Name: Item Type
Obj_arg0.Description: The item to be spawned after spinning near it.

Obj_arg1.Name: Validate Shadow?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, its shadow will be enabled.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.
